files.patch:
@@ -1,10 +0,0 @@
-param(
-  [Parameter(Mandatory=$true, HelpMessage="The path to the freeglut installation")]
-  [string]$freeglutPath
-)
-
-java `
-  -cp classes `
-  --enable-native-access=ALL-UNNAMED `
-  -D"java.library.path=C:\Windows\System32`;$freeglutPath\bin\x64" `
-  Teapot.java
